subject: Introduction to Psychology
review: Dr. Smith is an amazing professor! Her lectures are engaging, and she makes complex topics easy to understand.

subject: Calculus I
review: Dr. Doe knows his material well, but sometimes moves too fast. Attending office hours helps a lot.

subject: Organic Chemistry
review: The class is challenging, and Dr. Lee expects a lot. Her notes are good, but exams are tough.

subject: World History
review: Lectures are a bit dry and monotonous. Not very interactive, but the reading material is interesting.

subject: English Literature
review: Dr. Brown is passionate about literature. She encourages critical thinking, and the class discussions are great.

subject: Physics I
review: Dr. Davis is very knowledgeable, but he struggles to explain concepts clearly. Very difficult to follow.

subject: Introduction to Computer Science
review: One of the best professors I've had! Dr. Wilson makes learning programming fun and accessible.

subject: Macroeconomics
review: Dr. Taylor's lectures are informative, but the assignments are quite demanding. Needs better pacing.

subject: Sociology
review: Dr. White is very insightful and connects theories to real-world situations. Her classes are engaging.

subject: Biology
review: The lectures are detailed, but Dr. Thompson doesn't seem very approachable. Not my favorite class.
